select lc.id, lc.user_id, lc.content, lc.images, lc.status, lc.create_date, lc.del_flag, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages from leave_comments lc left join user_info ui on (ui.id = lc.user_id) where 1 = 1 lc.del_flag = '0'
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{leaveComments.userName},'%')
AND lc.status = #{leaveComments.status}
order by lc.create_date desc
